message: I'll take 99.9% and leave you 0.1%. This is just to show you how the game works, don't worry, I'm fair.
Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you take 10%. We can adjust in the next round if you'd like.
Let's split it 50/50.  We can both walk away with a decent share and avoid the risk of inflation eating away at our gains further.
